attributes.action: Nationalise or regulate fuel and energy costs. Stock market traders and investers are making money and the great British public are paying. OPEC confirm that there is no actual shortage of oil so Mr Brown , you can regulate and monitor TV companies so why can't you do the same for and essential energy and fuel costs. Surely this would  stop artifical increases in costs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
